error: There was an error while executing this command!
notSender: You are not the sender of this operation.
banMessage: You have been banned due to {reason} until {dateUntil}.
interactionError: There was an error while processing your interaction!
startMessageTitle: Welcome to the channel for finding people from your city!
startMessageDescription:
- Before using the bot, we recommend familiarizing yourself with the rules in the channel <#1243259987229278360>. If you have any questions or need assistance, check out the channel <#1249368481225244793>.

- To find people from your city, just use the command "/search", specifying your name, age, city, and what you are looking for.

- Please be polite and respect other channel members. We hope you find interesting people and have a great time!
mutualLikeSingle: You have {count} mutual like, would you like to see it?
mutualLikeMultiple: You have {count} mutual likes, would you like to see them?
reportReasonLabel: Enter the reason for the complaint
errorProcessing: An error occurred while processing the request
likedUserSingular: You liked by {count} user, show them?
likedUserPlural: You liked by {count} users, show them?
enterMessage: Enter your message to the user
selectWhoToFind: Select who you want to find
uploadPhotosVideos: Do you want to upload your photos/videos?
uploadPhotosVideosDescription: Please send your photos or videos up to 15 seconds long (maximum 3 files) within 3 minutes.
maxFilesUploaded: You have uploaded the maximum number of files.
fileSaveError: There was an error saving the file.
fileUploadError: There was an error uploading the file.
fileRequirementsError: Your file does not meet the requirements. Please send a photo or video up to 15 seconds.
fileUploadTimeout: You did not upload a photo or video in time.
fileUploadCancelled: You have cancelled the photo/video upload.
fillDescriptionProfile: Fill out the profile to interact with the bot
